properties.author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
properties.description: Detects usage of the PsLogList utility to dump event log in order to extract admin accounts and perform account discovery or delete events logs
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains " security" or ProcessCommandLine contains " application" or ProcessCommandLine contains " system") and (ProcessCommandLine contains " -d" or ProcessCommandLine contains " /d" or ProcessCommandLine contains " -x" or ProcessCommandLine contains " /x" or ProcessCommandLine contains " -s" or ProcessCommandLine contains " /s" or ProcessCommandLine contains " -c" or ProcessCommandLine contains " /c" or ProcessCommandLine contains " -g" or ProcessCommandLine contains " /g") and (ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "psloglist.exe" or (FolderPath endswith "\\psloglist.exe" or FolderPath endswith "\\psloglist64.exe"))
